publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3309# Mrs Margaret Ewing: NHS Dental Services in Moray-That the Parliament recognises that the provision of NHS dental services in Moray has reached crisis point; finds it unacceptable that residents of Moray now have to travel to Aberdeen to register with an NHS dentist, and believes that the Scottish Executive and Grampian NHS Board should increase their efforts to recruit and retain dentists to the area.

S1M-3309# NHS Dental Services in Moray (lodged on 19 August 2002) Brian Adam*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Mike Rumbles*, Shona Robison*, Nora Radcliffe*, Alex Neil*, Alasdair Morgan*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Irene McGugan*, Michael Matheson*, Fergus Ewing*, Colin Campbell*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Fiona McLeod*, Christine Grahame*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*

S1M-3309# Mrs Margaret Ewing: NHS Dental Services in Morayâ€”That the Parliament recognises that the provision of NHS dental services in Moray has reached crisis point; finds it unacceptable that residents of Moray now have to travel to Aberdeen to register with an NHS dentist, and believes that the Scottish Executive and Grampian NHS Board should increase their efforts to recruit and retain dentists to the area.Supported by: Brian Adam, Stewart Stevenson, Mary Scanlon, Mr Mike Rumbles, Shona Robison, Nora Radcliffe, Alex Neil, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Irene McGugan, Michael Matheson, Fergus Ewing, Colin Campbell, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Adam Ingram, Fiona McLeod, Christine Grahame, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Richard Lochhead, Adam Ingram*
S1M-3309# NHS Dental Services in Moray (lodged on 19 August 2002) Rhoda Grant*
S1M-3309# NHS Dental Services in Moray (lodged on 19 August 2002) Andrew Wilson*
